Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package boost for versions less than 1.76.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package boost for versions less than 1.76.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package boost is earlier than 1.76.0-3, affected by CVE-2018-25032
